field_guidance.header:
Regions are initially defined in the [WCRP-constants repository](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants). You can view existing regions at https://wcrp-cmip.github.io/WCRP-constants/region/

**If your region is not listed below**, you must first [register it in WCRP-constants](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/issues/new?template=region.yml) and wait for it to be approved before linking it here.

Once your region exists in WCRP-constants, use this form to make it available for use in CMIP7.
